name: Water ballon toss
discri: A delightful and refreshing game where participants toss water-filled balloons to each other, aiming to catch them without bursting. As the game progresses, the distances increase, adding an element of challenge and excitement. Perfect for cooling off and having fun at outdoor gatherings, picnics, and parties.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
